## Repository.hardDeleteById() method

Delete a document by its ID (hard)

**Signature:**

```typescript
hardDeleteById(id: MongoIdExt): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | [MongoIdExt](./subito-connector-mongodb.mongoidext.md) | ID of the document to HARD delete |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;any&gt;


## Remarks

It removes the doc from the DB, still prefer a soft deletion with [Repository.deleteById()](./subito-connector-mongodb.repository.deletebyid.md)
